greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n, k) = (k-1)*(3*n-k), read by rows.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 1..50 of the triangle, flattened
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=0} Sum_{n>=0} T(n,k)*x^n*y^k = y^2*x*(2*x+1-3*y)/((1-y)^3*(x-1)^2).  (G.f. for the full array, not just the triangular subspace) - _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 19 2020
program: (Sage) flatten([[(k-1)*(3*n-k) for k in (1..n)] for n in (1..12)]) # _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 01 2021
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 06 2008
